verses.name: Habakkuk 1:11
verses.text: Then shall his mind change, and he shall pass over, and offend, imputing this his power unto his god.

verses.name: Habakkuk 1:12
verses.text: Art thou not from everlasting, O Lord my God, mine Holy One? we shall not die. O Lord, thou hast ordained them for judgment; and, O mighty God, thou hast established them for correction.

verses.name: Habakkuk 1:13
verses.text: Thou art of purer eyes than to behold evil, and canst not look on iniquity: wherefore lookest thou upon them that deal treacherously, and holdest thy tongue when the wicked devoureth the man that is more righteous than he?
